comment.author: 27032987@N02
comment._content: my grandmother worked picking vegetables in South Florida in the early 1930's. My mom told me a little about it years ago.  My grandfather worked in the turpentine camps in Northwest Florida, around Munson and Berrydale, just North of Milton, Florida.

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/27032987@N02] Thanks for the comment. We'd love to see photographs if your family has any...
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
